applyPenalty(uint256,address,address,uin.details: Called by oracle when detecting violations

params.gasCost: The gas cost to reimburse oracle (in wei)

cancelGame(uint256).details: Only owner can cancel, only after deadline + grace period, only if underfilled

commitStartingValues(uint256,address[],u.details: Must be called after registration, before game starts

params.entryFee: Entry fee for this game (0.00015 - 0.002 ETH)
params.minPlayers: Minimum players required (will be validated against entryFee)
params.roundDuration: Duration of each round in seconds

params.gasCost: The gas cost to reimburse oracle (in wei)

params.eliminatedPlayers: Array of players who didn't make the cut
params.gasCost: The gas cost to reimburse oracle (in wei)

returns._0: Adjusted ETH, USDC, AERO, CAKE balances

returns.reward: The reward amount available (0 if not available)
returns.timeRemaining: Time remaining in reward window (0 if window passed or not started)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

startGame(uint256).details: Can be called by registered player or owner once registration deadline has passed

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawOperationsSurplus(uint256).details: Only owner can withdraw, only after game is finalized or cancelled

withdrawPlatformFees(uint256).details: Only owner can withdraw, only after game is finalized or cancelled

applyPenalty(uint256,address,address,uin.notice: Apply penalty for unauthorized token receipt

cancelGame(uint256).notice: Cancel underfilled game and refund players

commitStartingValues(uint256,address[],u.notice: Oracle commits starting portfolio values in USDC terms

createGame(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Create a new game with flexible pricing

emergencyWithdraw().notice: Emergency withdrawal (only if game is stuck)

finalizeRound(uint256,uint256,address[],.notice: Finalize round and eliminate bottom performers

getGamePlayers(uint256).notice: Get all players in a game

getStartReward(uint256).notice: Get start reward information for a game

register(uint256).notice: Register for a game and snapshot starting balances

startGame(uint256).notice: Start the first round (after registration period)

withdrawOperationsSurplus(uint256).notice: Withdraw operations fund surplus after game ends

withdrawPlatformFees(uint256).notice: Withdraw platform fees for a specific game
